subject: AI & Agents
title: Training Data: Garbage In, Garbage Out
description: A short lesson to help you apply Training Data: Garbage In, Garbage Out.

hook.text: An LLM trained on Reddit sounds different from one trained on textbooks. The data defines the model.

buildup.text: Training data includes books, web pages, code, conversations, and academic papers.

discovery.text: Data quality matters more than quantity. Curated data outperforms raw web scrapes.

twist.text: Copyright lawsuits loom. Authors and publishers argue their work was used without permission.

climax.text: The next frontier is synthetic data â€” AI generating training data for other AI.

punchline.text: You are what you eat. So is AI.

quiz.question: Why is training data quality important for LLMs?
options: Better data quality produces better model outputs
More data always means better results
Data quality doesn't affect the model
